project.teaser: There is a huge demand for dynamic, digital displays and lighting solutions of surfaces, indoor and outdoor, in automotive, transportation, aviation and health. But state-of-the-art solutions are either limited to single color lighting with no individual control of LED pixels...
project.objective: There is a huge demand for dynamic, digital displays and lighting solutions of surfaces, indoor and outdoor, in automotive, transportation, aviation and health. But state-of-the-art solutions are either limited to single color lighting with no individual control of LED pixels, or they are expensive, heavy, limited in size, shape, curvature and difficult to install. LightnTec is a leading innovator in Europe for light and its control on ultra-thin films and will exploit this business opportunity. ledTec.flex is ultra-thin, malleable, flat, large in scale, applicable indoors and outdoors, and digital – any size, any shape, any place, ultra-thin, ultra-lightweight. The technology offers a huge application potential as video foil in digital-out-of-home (DOOH), for medical illumination in healthcare, and for dynamic ambient lighting in trains, planes, vehicles and buildings. The EIC blended finance, will enable LightnTec to internationally deploy ledTec.flex and become the next EIC success.
project.title: The ultra thin, flexible, lightweight and endless scalable video foil for dynamic ambient lighting and outdoor displays
project.keywords: DOOH,Video-Display,LED-Walls,human centric lighting,dynamic lighting,digital lighting,light-on-foil,interior lighting,ambient lighting,LED,lighting

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
